DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to validate that an effect compartment concentration for loss of consciousness (LOC) was varied according to different Keo value.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Equilibration Rate Constant (ke0) of Propofol on the Effect Site Concentration for Loss of Consciousness
DOC.criteria: Adult patients undergoing general anesthesia Hepatic or renal disease Drug addiction
